response.original_title: Quigley's Village: Spike's Big Blue Bubble Babble Balloon Machine
response.overview: Danny, Spike, and Bubba each enter a contest to win the coveted Big Blue Bubble Babble Balloon Machine, promising to share it no matter who wins. When Spike wins and chooses to keep the prize for herself, a series of comic mishaps—including a very big sneeze—help her realize the joy and importance of sharing with others.
response.title: Quigley's Village: Spike's Big Blue Bubble Babble Balloon Machine
